question: Which of the following statements is correct about "e-Green Watch", sometimes seen in the news?
option1: It is a portal for effective communication of air quality in single number, nomenclature and colour.
option2: It is an online system developed under the Land use, land-use change, and forestry (LULUCF) to calculate the removals by afforestation
option3: It is an integrated e-governance portal used for effective online monitoring of the works undertaken by State CAMPA
option4: It is an international environmental body that certifies organic products and promotes organic movement
answer: It is an integrated e-governance portal used for effective online monitoring of the works undertaken by State CAMPA
explanation: e-Green Watch is designed and developed as a web-based workflow application and integrated information system which enables effective online monitoring of CAMPA funds and works executed by the State CAMPA. The application is capable of showing the Compensatory Afforestation, Diverted Land, Plantations, other Plantations and Assets categories on the Google earth imageries and FSI portal. It has been developed by National Informatics Centre (NIC).
